title._content: [Two unidentified soldier in Union uniforms with bayoneted muskets and pistols] (LOC)

description._content: [Two unidentified soldier in Union uniforms with bayoneted muskets and pistols] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype ; 7.3 x 6.0 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Rinhart, no. 135. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress).
